resources.string: Do you want to continue or start a new game?
Adrián Portela Ortiz\nJosé Carlos Sánchez Pérez
Now you can travel to Sarajevo.
You don\'t acquired the ticket. Try again?
Are you sure do you want to quit the game?
You\'ve to choose and option before continue
You don\'t have enough money to choose this transport
The World War III has taken place in Europe. You\'ve to flee in order to save your life.\n\n Hurry up! Try to be wise!
The enemies are about to arrive. What will you take with you?
Very good. Now you have 450€, foods, blankets and memories.\n\n Now it\'s time to leave. Do you want to pay for a means of transport or steal a car?
Very good. Now you have 250€, a passport, foods, blankets and memories.\n\n Now it\'s time to leave. Do you want to pay for a means of transport or steal a car?
You\'ve spent 300€, but you can travel by lorry.
Oh, no! There is too much weight! What do you want to get rid of?
You are hungry and thirsty. You\'ve to spend 100€
You are freezing. It\'s very cold. You\'ve to spend 100€ to be warm.
Congratulations! You can continue the journey.
Oh no, you have a flat tire! What do you want to do?
Do you want to continue on foot or do you prefer to wait till someone shows up?
You\'ve met some people on the way. Do you want to talk with them?
After a few days, you have met some people on the way and this time you decide to go with them.
They want to help you but they do not trust in people without passport. Do you have your passport?
Congratulations! You can continue the journey.
Some people stop to help you.
You have to spend 100€ to buy a fake one. Congratulations! You can continue the journey.

GOAL: 150€ / LEVEL EASY


You've just arrived in Milan, but you don't have enough money to buy one of the last coveted train tickets you need to travel to the next country.

 You need to get 150€ more to access the next level.

 Easy, right? So… do you want to play to get it?

GOAL: 250€ / LEVEL MEDIUM


You've just arrived in Milan, but you don't have enough money to buy one of the last coveted train tickets you need to travel to the next country.

 You need to get 250€ more to access the next level because some decisions have made you lose some money.

 So… do you want to play to get it?

GOAL: 350€ / LEVEL HARD


You've just arrived in Milan, but you don't have enough money to buy one of the last coveted train tickets you need to travel to the next country.

 You need to get 350€ more to access the next level because some decisions have made you lose a lot of money.

 So… do you want to play to get it?

GOAL: 450€ / LEVEL EXTREME


You've just arrived in Milan, but you don't have enough money to buy one of the last coveted train tickets you need to travel to the next country.

 You need to get 450€ more to access the next level because some decisions have made you lose more money than expected.

 So… do you want to play to get it?
Touch the screen to move the character. Collect the required amount of coins and the TRAIN TICKET while you avoid missiles and shots.
Do you really want to go out and return to the menu?
You have managed to escape and you can continue on your way to Istanbul.
You have not been able to flee. You will have to try again.
It is time to rest. Where do you wantt to stay?
Where you have to share your room with people from other nationalities?
Which one do you think it\'s your room?
Sorry! it isn\'t your room, but now you know more about Chinese people form other cultures. Try again!
Sorry! it isn\'t your room, but now you know more about Mexican people form other cultures. Try again!
Sorry! it isn\'t your room, but now you know more about African people form other cultures. Try again!
Finally, you\'have found your room! What a hard day, huh!
The next day, as you are walking down the street, a racist gang attacks you. What will you do?
They chase you, the police see something strange going on and think you are one of them. Run!
Remember, you don\'t have visa to enter the country. You are an illegal immigrant. They will arrest you. Run!
Luís M. Barquillo Romero\nMiguel del Puerto Melchor
Select the song you wanna play
Which place you wanna play at?
Your route between Istanbul and Tehran begins.
This time you will have to travel by ship. Will you buy the ticket or will you steal it?
Now you have your "free" ticket.\n\nDo you want to sell it or use it?
A policeman saw you and you are caught and fined.\nYou have to pay 100€.\nTry to be wiser!!
Oh,no! The ship is sinking! Everybody is running away.\nSuddenly, you realise your arab friend didn\'t follow you.\nDo you want to go back to save him?
You are trying to escape, but there is no way out.
He thanks you. Later, he will help you because you nearly drown. He also offers you some help to cross the border, but you don\'t know if that is a good idea.\nDo you want to go with him?
You walked in the wrong direction and got lost. You had to pay 50€ to get some information. Nobody wanted to help you.
Good! Both of you made it!
Now that you are at Tehran, you need some money. You have met a group of street musicians that want you to play with them.\nShow them how good you are with the guitar!!!!
Raúl Fernandez del Cerro\nRoberto Calvo García
Finally you have arrived in a country where you think you can live.
You have to look for a job to make a living. You need to check some ads.
Select the job offer you prefer
The day of the interview you have to choose your clothes. Which one would you choose?
The recruiter asks you in the interview…
Have you worked before in this country?
How well do you speak the language? Will you understand instructions?
Why do you think I should choose you?
What kind of degrees do you have?
I used to be a teacher
I used to work as an accountant
Have you been trained for this job before?
You have taken an object that you should not have, or you have let an object pass that you should catch
